mapper.sql: p.id, p.title, coalesce(p.summary,'暂无摘要') as summary, p.image, p.slider, p.status, p.featured, p.original, p.views, p.favors, p.pwd, p.channel_id, p.category_id, p.create_user, p.create_time, p.update_time
mapper.select:
select c.name as categoryName, (select count(1) from post_comment pc where pc.post_id = p.id) as comments,
from post_tag t join post_info p on t.post_id = p.id left join info_category c on p.category_id = c.id where t.tag_name = #{tag} order by p.create_time desc

select string_agg(t.tag_name, ',') AS tags, c.name as categorylName, c.name categoryName, pa.content, (select count(1) from post_comment pc where pc.post_id = p.id) as comments,
from post_info p left join post_content pa on p.id = pa.id left join info_category c on c.id = p.category_id left join post_tag t on p.id = t.post_id where p.id = #{id} and p.status = 1 group by p.id, c.name, pa.content
select p.id, p.title from post_info p left join info_channel c on c.id = p.channel_id where c.id = #{channelId} order by p.create_time
mapper.update: update post_info set views = views + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, title, create_time createTime from post_info where status = 1 order by create_time desc

select
from post_info p where p.status = 1 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_info(title,summary,image,pwd, slider, status, featured, channel_id, category_id, create_user, create_time, update_time) values(#{title},#{summary},#{image},#{pwd}, #{slider},#{status},#{featured}, #{channelId}, #{categoryId}, #{createUser},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
INSERT INTO post_content(id, content, editor) values(#{id}, #{content}, #{editor})
mapper.update: update post_info set title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, image = #{image}, pwd = #{pwd}, slider = #{slider}, status = #{status}, featured = #{featured}, channel_id = #{channelId}, category_id = #{categoryId}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
